items.sentence: I thought you knew Tom graduated from Harvard.
I threw away all the letters that Tom sent me.
Tom broke his left ankle during a rugby match.
Tom cleared his throat and continued to speak.
Tom crashed his car the same day he bought it.
Tom\'s friends knew he couldn\'t speak French.
Tom told Mary that he\'d seen John with Alice.
Tom told everyone that he was Mary\'s husband.
I couldn\'t anticipate that that would happen.
Tom is willing to help us tomorrow, isn\'t he?
